CRIM.description: Per capita crime rate by town

ZN.description: Proportion of residential land zoned for lots over 25,000 sq.ft.

INDUS.description: Proportion of non-retail business acres per town

CHAS.description: Charles River dummy variable (= 1 if tract bounds river; 0 otherwise)

value_dict.0: Tract does not bound Charles River

RM.description: Average number of rooms per dwelling

AGE.description: Proportion of owner-occupied units built prior to 1940

DIS.description: Weighted distances to five Boston employment centres

RAD.description: Index of accessibility to radial highways

B.description: 1000(Bk - 0.63)^2 where Bk is the proportion of Black people by town

MEDV.description: Median value of owner-occupied homes in $1000s

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, please predict the median value of owner-occupied homes in $1000s.
prompt.answer_prompt: The median value of owner-occupied homes is: .

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, please predict the percentage of lower status of the population.
prompt.answer_prompt: The percentage of lower status of the population is: .

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, please predict the average number of rooms per dwelling.
